ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.NAME: My name is Amanda Rodrigues da Silva.
ABOUT.EXPERIENCE: I don't have much experience in the job market, but I am seeking new opportunities that will help me pursue my dream!
ABOUT.DEVELOPING_IT: I am developing myself in the IT field and really want to use that to help people in some way in the future.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS.TEXT_RIGHT: I began my journey in the field by intensely studying front-end, focusing on HTML and CSS, which made me more acquainted with this domain than with back-end for a while. However, I deepened my understanding in Analysis and Systems Development through comprehensive online courses and university studies. Consequently, I acquired skills in applying the Java language for SQL database manipulation, including CRUD operations. I can confidently state that my focus has now shifted to back-end development. Java was my inaugural programming language, and currently, I am directing my studies towards Angular, Spring, and SAP.
